document_data.name: Julann
document_data.mainbody:
'''Julann''' was a member of the [[Wychlaran]] of [[Rashemen]] who traveled to the [[Sword Coast]] on her ''[[dajemma]]'', accompanied by her [[Rashemaar berserkers|berserker]] bodyguard [[Rigah]], in the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].
{{Quote|''"I wonder if birds ever die of old age while they're flying and fall RIGHT out of the sky?"''|Julann}}
document_data.Personality: Julann was prone to impulsive decisions and regularly acted on her whims. While she freely trusted others, her judgement as to their motives was somewhat misguided.
document_data.Relationships: She had a complicated relationship with Rigah. While he looked to her for guidance and wisdom he thought her actions to be guided by nothing more than randomness.
document_data.History:
Julann and Rigah departed from Rashemen on their ''dajemma'' to seek out the [[Bhaalspawn|child]] of [[Bhaal]] who was referred to in the [[Prophecies of Alaundo|prophecies]] of [[Alaundo]].

The pair traveled for years, often making their decisions based on little more than Julann's whims. When they heard about the rumors of a divine being in the {{YearlinkName|1368}}, Julann and Rigah considered joining up with the [[Shining Crusade]].
